answers.answer: All my babies are big too.  Two year old girl was almost 9 pounds.  Due on the 30th of this month but will be induced by the 23 because baby is big and I have alot of extra fluid.  I'm 36 1/2 weeks and measuring 43 with this one...lol.  It's a boy and he's already about 7.5 pounds.
I just wanted to update.  I'm a little over 37 weeks.  Baby boy weighs 9lb 6 oz.  already.  This one very likely will be 11 lbs if I go to term.

question: My first baby was 10lbs 3 oz 22 inches longI was induced and only pushed for 1hr 40 minsI had my daughter at 18 and am now 20 and 38+1 pregnant with another little girl. I had an ultrasound at 37 weeks and she was 8lbs 13 oz already.I wasn't overweight when i got pregnant with my first and i don't have diabetes or anything like that i just make big babies!They predict she will be close to 11lbs.anyone else make big babies?
title: mama who make big babies
